meanings.definition: Identical with or the same as previously mentioned.
meanings.sent1: The selfsame dress she wore yesterday is hanging in the closet.
meanings.sent2: The selfsame book I read last week is on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: It was the selfsame cat that always got stuck in the tree.
meanings.sent4: The selfsame melody played in my mind all day long.
meanings.sent5: The selfsame flower bloomed in the garden every spring.

meanings.sent1: She saw the selfsame squirrel in the park every morning.
meanings.sent2: The selfsame car passed by our house twice today.
meanings.sent3: The selfsame cup was used for every tea party she hosted.
meanings.sent4: He was the selfsame student who always asked insightful questions.
meanings.sent5: The selfsame tree provided shade for generations of picnickers.
